DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate whether yoga qigong therapy effective treating low back pain elderly patient compare therapy ( wait list control ) . The secondary aim compare yoga qigong .
DOC.brief_title: Yoga Qigong Elderly Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Men woman ≥ 65 year age Chronic low back pain since 6 month least Functional Rating Index ( FRI ) ≥ 2 last 7 day Informed consent form sign Disc prolapse acute neurological symptom Previous spinal operation Severe organic psychiatric disease condition , allow participate trial Use opioids Drug alcoholaddiction Participation another clinical trial within last 6 month Participation yoga qigong train within last 12 month Planned physical therapy within study duration
